knimeNode.name: GeneSetAnalysis
knimeNode.shortDescription: Analyzes case-control sequencing studies on gene set level.

fullDescription.intro: This node analyzes case-control sequencing studies on gene set level. It enables the identification of gene sets whose genes are significantly more often affected by LOF mutations in the case or in the control group. To this end, a Wilcoxon signed-rank test is performed applied on the p-values of the hypergeometric background test (see GeneBasedAnalysis).
fullDescription.option: The node can be applied to any gene set defined in the MSigDB. Please download only gene sets ending with .symbols.gmt. Specify a gene set symbol to differentiate summary files based on different gene sets.
Select the column of the gene identifier and the gene-based background frequency in the model file. Specify the correct background population size to get valid results.
